channel.title: Robotics on TMC - 8 Digital Tech

item.title: Basic Movement
item.description: This example project shows how you can make a robotic vehicle drive for a given distance or turn by a given angle. Check out the DriveBase class for tips and tricks for precise movements. Example program #!/usr/bin/env pybricks-micropython """ Example LEGO® MINDSTORMS® EV3 Robot Educator Driving Base Program ----------------------------------------------------------------- This program requires LEGO® EV3 MicroPython v2.0. Download: https://education.lego.com/en-us/support/mindstorms-ev3/python-for-ev3 Building instructions can be found at: https://education.lego.com/en-us/support/mindstorms-ev3/building-instructions#robot """ from pybricks.
